home_content:
Hi, welcome to my website.

I'm a computer science student who holds interest in languages such as C++, Rust, Haskell and Python. I occasionally publish blog posts about computer science and japanese language. You can access my personal git repositories.

I'm currently rebuilding my website from scratch using Rust to develop the backend. The source code can be found in my repositories on Github.
title: title
japanese_french_only: French only. I decided to only make articles about japanese in french because there is already more than enough free material in english (not in french).
